metadata.title: CVE-2018-12423 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In Synapse before 0.31.2, unauthorised users can hijack rooms when there isno m.room.power_levels event in force.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12423` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.24.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
